description:
The school is going to be closed?! Apparently that all depends on the results of the open campus event in two weeks. In order to protect Otonokizaka High, her own grandmother`s high school, Eli searches for ways to make the open campus a success.
Meanwhile, the girls begin practicing in preparation for the open campus, but having realized Eli`s true abilities, Umi begins worrying about her own group`s dancing. Umi explains the situation to the others and recommends they ask Eli to teach them to dance, but...
Source: crunchyroll
